channel.title: New Zealand Open Research Network
channel.description: Recent content on New Zealand Open Research Network

item.title: We're live!
item.description: The New Zealand Open Research Network website is now live. This is just a placeholder for the moment - blog posts will come in the future.

item.title: Massey University Affect, Cognition & Environment cluster
item.description: Massey University Affect, Cognition & Environment cluster Massey University is a New Zealand University spread across three campuses (Auckland, Wellington, and Palmerston North). There is a strong concentration of researchers interested in Open Science issues at the School of Psychology in the Affect, Cognition and Environment (ACE) research cluster. Let’s add information about communities at more New Zealand universities here - get in touch via Twitter to have your university added.
